segment.source: Links to troubleshooting topics and log files that can help address Group Policy problems with Internet Explorer 11.
segment.target: Links to troubleshooting topics and log files that can help address Group Policy problems with Internet Explorer 11.

segment.source: Group Policy problems with Internet Explorer 11 (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Group Policy problems with Internet Explorer 11 (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Group Policy problems with Internet Explorer 11
segment.target: Group Policy problems with Internet Explorer 11

segment.source: If you're having problems with Group Policy and Internet Explorer 11, or if you're looking for high-level information about the concepts and techniques used to troubleshoot Group Policy, as well as links to detailed reference topics, procedures, and troubleshooting scenario guides, see Group Policy Analysis and Troubleshooting Overview.
segment.target: If you're having problems with Group Policy and Internet Explorer 11, or if you're looking for high-level information about the concepts and techniques used to troubleshoot Group Policy, as well as links to detailed reference topics, procedures, and troubleshooting scenario guides, see Group Policy Analysis and Troubleshooting Overview.

segment.source: You can use the Event Viewer to review Group Policy-related messages in the Windows Logs, System file.
segment.target: You can use the Event Viewer to review Group Policy-related messages in the Windows Logs, System file.

segment.source: All of the Group Policy-related events are shown with a source of GroupPolicy.
segment.target: All of the Group Policy-related events are shown with a source of GroupPolicy.

segment.source: For more information about the Event Viewer, see What information appears in event logs? (Event Viewer).
segment.target: For more information about the Event Viewer, see What information appears in event logs? (Event Viewer).
